text: Triad was a Swedish pop trio. The trio consisted of Janne Bark, Lasse Lindbom and Niklas Strömstedt. They mostly became famous for scoring a 1987-1988 Swedish number-one single hit with the Christmas song Tänd ett ljus ==Discography== ===Singles=== *1987: "Tänd ett ljus" ==References== Category:1988 disestablishments in Europe Category:Swedish musical groups Category:Swedish pop music groups Category:Musical groups established in 1987 Category:Musical trios Category:1987 establishments in Sweden Category:1980s disestablishments in Sweden
title: Triad (band)
